long_description: The REI Camp Table XL delivers lots of surface area in a travel-friendly design-great for the campsite or house party. Aluminum/steel legs and heat-resistant aluminum slat top provide a stable, rigid work surface and dining area. Roll-top design packs up small, yet provides plenty of space for pots, pans and plates. Single adjustable leg accommodates uneven ground. Packs up into the stuff sack included for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: The REI Camp Table XL delivers lots of surface area in a travel-friendly design-great for the campsite or house party.
